description.space:
Located in the heart of the romantic zone, Romantic Amapas is a heaven of luxury itself. Romantic Amapas is located in the Romantic Zone in the beautiful old town of Puerto Vallarta . Breathtaking views from the double terrace will provide a life time of memories of spectacular sunsets, rolling waves of the Pacific Ocean and the pristine Los Muertos Beach. The condo offers not only a prime location and magnificent views but has been appointed with only the best that you would expect. Come pamper yourself. High-end finishes and all the amenities you’re looking for in a vacation rental, Romantic Amapas has everything and more.

        Simply the best.
        Just steps away from world-class restaurants and bars, boutiques, the magnificent Los Muertos Beach, the isla rio cuale and its lush vegetation and a 10-minute walk from the famous El Malecon. With all the amenities from home in your very own paradise, Romantic Amapas offers all the luxuries you desire in your vacation. You’ll enjoy an on-site gym plus a roof top pool area with Jacuzzi, barbeque and shaded areas all overlooking the magnificent beach. Inside, your suite includes a large, open living area and gourmet kitchen. A king size bed in the bedroom that looks over the ocean and mountain. Two balconies with Jacuzzi offer amazing views and some of the best sunsets in the world. Rest in air-conditioned comfort while enjoying internet and satelite television. Your stay will be made even easier with weekly maid service included.

        Brand new condo, 1 Bedroom, 2 Baths (sleeps 2)

        Access to Los Muertos beach 1 block away directly in front of Romantic Amapas.
        Short walk from world class restaurants and bars, boutiques, beach, and a 10 minute walk to the famous El Malecon
        Onsite Gym
        Elevator and wheelchair accessible to all levels
        Roof top infinity pool, Jacuzzi, BBQ, sun and shaded terrace area, restrooms and shower
        Guest/private parking
        Local calls
        King size bed
        Queen size pull out couch
        Walk in closet
        35 foot balcony overlooking the beach offering an unobstructed view of the worlds most amazing sunsets
        Private balcony off bedroom with a jacuzzi tub for 2
        Air conditioning and fans
        Flat screen TV in living room and bedroom
        Gourmet kitchen, granite counter tops, brand name appliances include refrigerator, dishwasher, gas stove, hood fan, microwave oven, conventional oven, in sink waste disposal, double sink, washer and dryer
        Internet wi-fi and satelite tv
        Weekly maid service included (additional maid service available)

description.interaction: Our concierge department, Mexitravels will be pending of any of your needs.

house_rules.details:
We would like to bring your attention to a few request while you enjoy your stay:

          1. As this is a private home, your respectful use of furnishings, decor, facilities is truly appreciated. Quiet hours 11 pm-8 am. Max occupancy determined at the time of your reservation. US 50 per night per person will be charge when default on notifying the correct number of parties.

          2. Suntan lotion easily damages furnishings. Please keep this on mind when sitting down.

          3. This is a NON SMOKING property but you are welcome to do so in the balcony area. Thank you for your respect for future visitors staying after you.

          4. No PETS allowed.

          5. AC is operated with associated remote control in the room. Please don't leave the air conditioning running while not in the condo or in the room or while windows are open. It only takes a few minutes to cool down the room when the air conditioning is turned on. We attempt to keep our rental rates competitive, so your assistance in limiting the use of AC is truly appreciated.

          6. Wi Fi Network provided while checking in.

          7. GARBAGE is to be placed at the white garbage bins located on guest parking space on highway 200 entrance door.

          8. MAID SERVICES provided once per week. If maid services are required more than this, arrangements can be made at an additional price.

          9. ROOF GARDEN use of the infinity pool, Jacuzzi, BBQ, GYM and the rest of amenities are available 8 am-10 pm. Please notice, you are required to keep the area clean after use.

          10. PARKING allowed only at the assigned spot (next to the elevator). We require advanced notice you will use the parking to provide a remote control to operate garage door.

          11. Interphone provided when checking in.

          A second misbehavior warning will result in guest vacating the Premises with no refund.

          Additional information about rental rates
          *Approximate Monthly rates, actual rate will depend on the days of the month you stay

          Property Policy: Romantic Amapas under no circumstance will be held responsible for any guest who does not respect said policies, failure to abide will result in the cancellation of the reservation and/or eviction from the vacation property without any right of refund.

          Check-in: The normal check-in time is 3:00 pm and check-out time is 12:00 pm. We will meet you at the property and give you one set of keys and inspect the property with you to assure that all is well. If you will need more than one set of keys or if you need a special check-in or check-out time please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you.

          Hold Harmless: Romantic Amapas and the property owners will be held harmless for any problems, injuries, loss or damage to the property or to any persons occupying the rental property. Problems relating to construction and construction noises are not controllable by Romantic Amapas or the property owners and we will in no way be held responsible.

          Number of Guests: The number of guests shown on your booking confirmation is the maximum allowed to occupy the rental property. If you exceed the max capacity of the unit you will be charged an additional $50 USD per night per additional person and will be allowed to occupy the property only if the property owner and/or representative approves and if the property can properly accommodate you. If guest fails to notify Romantic Amapas or anyone and brings more people into the property, the guest will have to leave the property immediately without any refund including the security deposit if applicable.

          Should you require anything during your stay you can (EMAIL HIDDEN) or call +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

          Enjoy your stay.

cancellation.details: Cancel up to 60 days before check in and get a 50% refund (minus service fees). Cancel within 60 days of your trip and the reservation is non-refundable. Service fees are refunded when cancellation happens before check in and within 48 hours of booking.

reviews.review: This place was so amazing! The balcony was so relaxing and the rooftop pool had spectacular views. The condo itself was just as perfect. we were greeted as soon as we arrived and they were able to answer any question and phone call I had. I felt like I was at home! The only thing I would mention is that there is construction going on right across the street. It begins about 7-730 am and it's mighty hard to sleep through. Other than that it could not have been any better!

Great location and overall the condo was beautiful and had a great scenic view. It was very close to the beach and close to everything. Plenty of restaurants around and overall a safe neighborhood. Didn't have a problem walking late at night. Only thing is the construction that is going on across the street, which will probably wake you up early, but that wasn't a big deal. Easy communication with Katia and Margasaret, who checked us in and showed us around the condo. Overall, I would recommend the place and would stay here again.
Great location right by Green Chairs and Mantamar! Very gay friendly neighborhood.

This is a great location. It's close to the beach and restaurants with a wonderful view. The rooftop pool is wonderful and the building is well maintained. If you plan on lounging at the condo during the day or sleeping in, just be aware of the construction noise.

amazing location we walked right down to beach, incredible view close to all restaurants and shops. I loved this place we spent two weeks there and I did not want to come home. Beautiful quite rooftop pool (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

The condo looks even more beautiful than the pictures!! Great location, walking distance to all shops, restaurants, the beach and the pier! Also our host was amazing and very easy to get in touch with, she helped us get tickets for Rhythms of the Night as well, and that was our favorite part of the trip!! 10/10 recommend, hopefully we can come back some day!

response.message: Thank you we will make sure to take care of this issue immediately. We look forward to host you in the future.

reviews.review: The perfect PV condo. Ideal location, gorgeous views, awesome rooftop pool. I will definitely stay here again.

hosts.name: Luxury Villas
hosts.description: Luxury Villas is a Vacation Rental Company specialized on selected Luxury Villas and Condos with over 15 years of experience, our destinations include Puerto Vallarta, Riviera Nayarit, Mazatlan, Playa del Carmen, Cancun, Cabos, Merida Yucatan, Acapulco and Ixtapa Zihuatanejo. Most of our properties come with full staff and have been personally inspected to offer you nothing but the higher standards.
